Dashboard

  1. Dashboard

Finacial Help

You are new to applying for loans, or you just want to find other ways to make money outside of college, this website is designed to help you suit your needs.

If you are in this website, chances are your high school did not inform you or your parents about what to do when you finish graduating. Maybe you want to go to college, maybe you don't. This site doesn't necessarily force you or your child to go to college, the focus is to inform you as much as possible about the logistics of applying to a college, especially an afforadable one. We also inform you to look for other methods of gaining income aside from college, like using simple applicatioons on your cellphone that help you infest spare change that will eventualy lead to big savings. We have links designed for Spanish speaking students and parents that are less oriented about choosing the correct paths so that there can be financial stability.

The website offers a calculator that allows you to have an estimate of how much tuition you can afford. Also, we have a goals option that directs you to the correct path to inform you about what financial desicions are right for you. You can be just a high school student, an undergraduate or a parent, you are sent to the right path.

Please visit our Resources page, all links and references to other websites regarding student loans, applying for college, small investments and more are available.
Making an account is very simple and requires just your name and email, as well as what school you are attending and which you plan on attending, if any. This helps us keep track of who enters our website so we can send emails with additional information, should you need.
Please feel free to contact us at the help desk, on the bottom of the resources page. If any issue arises or you need to be more informed about a particular subject, please contact us.
